name: Hermit
description: You lived in seclusion â€” either in a sheltered community such as a monastery, or entirely alone. In your time apart from the clamor of society, you found quiet, solitude, and perhaps some of the answers you were looking for.

feature.name: Discovery
feature.description: The quiet seclusion of your extended hermitage gave you access to a unique and powerful discovery. The exact nature of this revelation depends on the nature of your seclusion. It might be a great truth about the cosmos, the deities, the powerful beings of the outer planes, or the forces of nature.

traits.name: Skill Proficiencies
traits.description: You gain proficiency in the Medicine and Religion skills.

traits.name: Tool & Language Proficiencies
traits.description: You gain proficiency with the herbalism kit and one language of your choice.
